This gripping film follows a maverick bomb disposal unit in Iraq, starring Jeremy Renner as the intense and dedicated Sergeant. It's an edge-of-your-seat thrill ride that explores the psychological toll of war.

If you're looking for something a bit more romantic and set during World War II, "To Have and Have Not" (1937) is a classic choice. This iconic film stars Humphrey Bogart as an American expatriate helping the French Resistance, alongside Lauren Bacall as the sultry lounge singer he falls for. It's a swashbuckling adventure with plenty of twists and turns!
